modName: Silent Rune Spells and Rune Limit Uncapper
summary: This mod makes it so that casting any Rune spell (Fire/Lightning/Ice) will not alert every enemy NPC in a 5 mile radius. It will also remove the limit on active runes (optional).
descriptionHtml:
S I L E N T . R U N E . S P E L L S +
R U N E . L I M I T  . U N C A P P E R
============  v1.0.0  =============

Mod by luc1dox
visit me at http://www.bsnooch.com


[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]

This mod makes it so that casting any Rune spell (Fire/Lightning/Ice) will not alert every enemy NPC in a 5 mile radius. It will also remove the limit on active runes (optional).

Enemies will see the flash of light created when the rune is placed on a surface so you can\'t be casting it right under a bandits nose without them getting suspicious.


[b]INSTALLATION[/b]

1a) Download with NMM
-OR-
1b) Download manually, and place the [i]SilentRuneSpells_v100.esp[/i] file in your [i]Data[/i] folder.

2.) Activate!


[b]UNINSTALL[/b]

1a.) De-activate with NMM.
-OR-
1b.) Delete [i]SilentRuneSpells_v100.esp[/i] from your [i]Data[/i] folder.


[b]CHANGELOG[/b]

-- v1.0.0 --
- Initial release.
- Fire/Ice/Lightning Rune spells now silent!
- Removed limit on active runes. (optional)
author: luc1dox
